price: 14. Markaasay ka jeesteen oo yidhaahdeen: waa mid si fiican wax la soo baray, Jinnoole ah.
arabic: ثُمَّ تَوَلَّوۡاْ عَنۡهُ وَقَالُواْ مُعَلَّمٞ مَّجۡنُونٌ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: thumma tawallaw ʿanhu waqālū muʿallamun majnūnun
